Plot: Tom Green stars as a bumbling buffoon, who lands at Butling after working his way through all other 'A' and 'B' jobs.
Title: Bob the Butler
Writer: Jane Walker Wood (story), Steven Manners (story), Jane Walker Wood (screenplay), Steven Manners (screenplay), Gary Sinyor (screenplay)
Actors: Tom Green, Brooke Shields, Genevieve Buechner, Benjamin B. Smith
